ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was supported by a grant from the Funding Program for Next Generation World-Leading Researchers (NEXT Program, GR052) and JSPS-KAKENHI grant number 26257202. We thank A. K채채b and A. Gardner for providing their TEC data. Valuable comments from E. Berthier, A. K채채b, A. Gardner, and G. Cogley significantly improved our manuscript.
